title: Getting The News To West African Youth, Through Hip-Hop
teaser: In Dakar, Senegal, two rappers going by the names Keyti and Xuman offer a summary of the week's news in hip-hop format. This story originally aired on All Things Considered on Jan. 15, 2015.
contentencoded:
In Dakar, Senegal, two rappers going by the names Keyti and Xuman offer a summary of the week's news in hip-hop format.

This story originally aired on All Things Considered on Jan. 15, 2015.
